title: Lower Body Stretch  - Muscle Recovery and Stress Relief
description:
The MrandMrsMuscle YouTube Channel provides hundreds of FREE easy-to-follow home workouts that are designed to get you to your fitness goals as quickly and efficiently as possible.
All workouts on this channel are professionally programmed and include low impact modifications to ensure that you get the very best out of each workout regardless of your training level.

For full access to our highly effective weight loss training programs, meal plans and exclusive content visit: https://mrandmrsmuscle.com and get your 7-day free trial.

channelDescription:
☆Why use MrandMrsMuscle Workouts?
We use scientifically proven micro workouts combined with HIIT to bring you extremely effective short workouts that burn fat, build muscle, increase your strength and develop your functional fitness.

The MrandMrsMuscle training style is suited to those who need time efficient workouts that are easy-to-follow and deliver real results in record time!

☆How to get the BEST RESULTS with the MrandMrsMuscle Workouts?
Download our App! 
https://MrandMrsMuscle.com for more details

☆Are MrandMrsMuscle Trainers Qualified?
Yes.
Viv Addo:
- GCSE & A-Levels in Physical Education
- BSc Hons Degree in Sports Science
- AIQ Level 3 Diploma in Fitness Instruction and Personal Training

Mike Addo:
- AIQ Level 3 Diploma in Fitness Instruction and Personal Training

Invest in yourself and Subscribe.

comments: Thanks for getting right to the stretch.
Perfect stretches with wonderful back ground music. One of my favorite lower body stretches for after work
Love the music…. I was swinging my hips throughout 🥰
Love the timer on the right. So many stretching videos don't have real-time and THIS ONE was very helpful.
Thank you for this!! And thank you for allowing a quick break in between moves
